Speech to Text: Should I consult a doctor or do some natural remedies?
Doctor's Response: With what I see, I think you have some form of scalp infection or skin condition, possibly dandruff or seborrheic dermatitis, given the yellowish flakes and patches on your scalp. You should consult a doctor to determine the best course of treatment, which may include medicated shampoos or creams, and in the meantime, try using a gentle shampoo and avoiding scratching the affected area to prevent further irritation.
